content: a toque fit for a canuck eh design by lyndsay richardson show your canadian pride this winter with a circle of maple leaves around your head topped off with a white fluffy snowball materials  1 skein cascade 220 colour#9404 red r  1 skein cascade 220 colour#8505 white w  16 circular needle 3 75mm and set of dpns 3 75mm  tapestry needle one size fits average adult abbreviations k knit p purl k1tbl knit one stitch through back of the loop k2tog knit two stitches together ssk slip first stitch as if to knit slip second stitch as if to knit knit the two stitches together instructions brim cast on 102 stitches using long-tail provisional cast-on row 1-10 using r k1tbl p1 repeat until end of round row 11 using r knit one row plain body of hat row 12-48 using r and w work in chart pattern for body of hat decreases row 49 using r k2tog k15 ssk repeat until end of round row 50 knit one row plain row 51 k2tog k13 ssk repeat row 52 knit one row plain row 53 k2tog k11 ssk repeat row 54 knit one row plain row 55 k2tog k9 ssk repeat row 56 knit one row plain row 57 k2tog k7 ssk repeat row 58 knit one row plain row 59 k2tog k5 ssk repeat row 60 k2tog k3 ssk repeat row 61 k2tog k1 ssk repeat row 62 k2tog repeat finishing weave in loose ends block if desired make pom-pom and secure to top wear with canadian pride chart this pattern is free for distribution and usage please e-mail comments to lyndsay richardson0@gmail com
